title: Evil At Night | True Ghost Stories
description:
Today on another chilling episode of Real Ghost Stories Online. 

When a young woman is charged with closing the bagel shop she works at late one night, she discovers she is in for far more than anyone could have ever expected. 

As shadowy figures, names being whispered in the dark, and much more unexplained activity takes over an otherwise “normal” night. 

That story, and so much more, today, on Real Ghost Stories Online.



If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!

To get access to:

  • The Worlds LARGEST AUDIO ARCHIVE of GHOST STORIES!
  • New EPP Bonus Episodes Every Week and ALL of our past EPP Bonus Episodes
  • Advance Episodes of the show (ALL AD FREE)

Then sign up to be a supporter, we call them "EPP's" (Extra Podcast People)!

Become an EPP here: http://www.ghostpodcast.com/?page_id=118 or at or at http://www.patreon.com/realghoststories
